profile:
At Reliance Yanch, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.


Reliance Yanch Home Comfort is able to provide a wide variety and depth to our range of HVAC services. We have become the leading source for heating, air conditioning and home comfort systems in Central Ontario including Simcoe County, southern Georgian Bay and the Muskokas. Our mission is to be the leading service and Installation Company in residential heating and air conditioning. 
From our locations in Barrie and Collingwood, we offer a full range of home comfort equipment and services, from design and installation to service and repair. We are specialists in the replacement of residential heating, air conditioning and domestic hot water systems including natural gas, electric, propane and geothermal systems.

Furnaces, Air Conditioners, Water Heaters, Air Purifiers, Boilers, Humidifiers, Ductless Air Conditioners 
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
Quinn Water Systems is the leading water treatment and purification company in Ontario. 
Founded in 2019, Quinn's innovative approach to water has been a game-changer for many Canadian households.
You can always contact us 24/7 for you enquiries or ask for services.
We are based in Richmond Hill, On and willing to travel any location in Ontario. 

Our Services:
· We service and install all kinds of Water Purification and Water Filtration Systems: Water Softeners, Water Filters, Reverse Osmosis, UV Light.. for houses, cottage and commercial projects in all Ontario locations including:
- Inspect and Install Water Systems
- Control Valve programming
- Control Valve head rebuild or replacement. 
- Media Change, including carbon and resin.
- Filter Change, cleaning and disinfecting reverse osmosis and multi stage under sink systems...
· Top brands choice: Clack, Kinetico, Pentair...
· Plumbing and Renovating services from licensed plumbers

------------------
24/7 Service all Ontario. No- Obligation In Home Consultation
All performed under COVID-19 guidelines!
·  No monthly bills.
·. Every process is transparent.

TREAT YOURSELF TODAY! GET PROFESSIONALLY TREATED WATER AT EVERY TAP!

profile:
Purisoft Water Solutions is family owned and operated. Our family is committed to providing your family with pure, healthy, soft water. Our customers receive friendly, reliable and uncompromising service. We also offer free installation on all our products!

Purisoft Water Solutions services a large portion of Central Ontario. With two family owned locations in Barrie and Waterloo, we service all of Simcoe County, Kitchener-Waterloo, Cambridge and surrounding areas. Each area is unique in their water situation and water treatment needs. We at Purisoft Water Solutions have the equipment you require make your home or cottage water pure and soft.

Our products are industry leaders with the newest technology and the highest level of quality, but also reasonably priced so that anyone can enjoy the benefits of pure, soft water. We are committed to complete 100% customer satisfaction.

CALL US TODAY
Barrie 705-331-1813
Toll Free 877-778-8579
CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE- www.purisoftwater.com

We're social here:
https://www.pinterest.ca/purisoftwaterbarrie/
https://twitter.com/PurisoftWater

profile:
Visit your local Water Depot store. We specialize in water treatment equipment.  Everything a home owner could need from Water Softeners, Reverse Osmosis Systems, Iron Filtration, Ultra-Violet Systems, Replacement Filters, Housings and more.

With over 36 locations throughout Ontario, we offer a wide range of products to improve water quality, including:

Water Softeners
Iron Removal Systems
Reverse Osmosis Units
Ultraviolet Systems
Filters and Cartridges
Housings
Home Essential Products
Each of our locations also has an in-store u-fill station that contains pure, clean water and provides you with a cost-effective option for filling up.

Wherever you use water - from your home - to the office – to your hot tub or spa, Water Depot can help!

profile:
Simcoe Water Solutions have 30 years combined water treatment experience  in residential, commercial and farm. 

Water Softeners for dealing with hardness buildup in plumbing, appliances, fixtures and glass. 

Iron Filters to stop iron staining in your home and buildup in plumbing, appliances and fixtures.

Carbon Filters to remove chlorine, heavy metals, tastes, odors and various other potential contaminates 

Uv Systems for disinfection of potential Bacteria 

Solutions for Sulphur smell in well water! 

No matter what your water worries are, we have solutions for clear, clean water and peace of mind.

profile:
Family owned and operated, Great Lakes Water Solutions has become known for our particular brand of excellence and integrity in serving the water treatment needs of Simcoe County and beyond.  With nearly 30 years in the industry, fair pricing and friendly, expert staff, we offer sales and service on all makes and models of water treatment equipment for your home or business.  Great Lakes Water Solutions is your local, recognized expert in water treatment and we look forward to hearing from YOU!  
        
Mission Statement:  “Research, design and installation of water solutions to meet each customer’s specific needs, using the latest and best water treatment technology, by people who know our most valuable product by far is a happy customer.” 
  
(Customers outside of the 705 area - and after hours emergencies - please call toll free 866-396-0111.)
